May 20, 1905 D Chester-le-Street Contest (First Section)
Chester-le-Street Contest (First Section) 10 Test Piece Contest Chester-le-Street Contest chester-le-street-contest-first-section
None
L'Arlesienne
Chester-le-Street, County Durham International contest between England and Scotland. 4 bands from the Scottish Amateur BBA competed against 4 bands from the Durham and Northumberland BBA. 8 bands competed.
Feb. 6, 2012, 3:22 p.m. Sept. 6, 2018, 9:36 a.m.
1 Backworth Colliery Band John Gladney Jnr
2 Polton Mills Friend Farrand
3 Spencer's Steelworks Prize Band Robert Rimmer
4 Heworth Colliery Band James Oliver
5 Alloa Burgh William Swingler
Unknown Result Bo'ness and Carriden Band Friend Farrand
Unknown Result Broxburn Public Band Robert Rimmer
Unknown Result South Moor Colliery Silver Prize Band J. W. Grayson
